languages.text: Право покровительствовать Фолстоуну привлекает многих. Но с помощью Вольного Торговца Орден Молота сохранит высшую власть над миром.

traits.locale_text: Пригласить на планету культ святого Друза, посвятить мир святому Друзу.

languages.text: The privilege of becoming Foulstone's patron is a tempting prospect for many. However, with the Rogue Trader's assistance, the Order of the Hammer will retain ultimate authority over the world.
languages.original_text: Право покровительствовать Фолстоуну привлекает многих. Но с помощью Вольного Торговца Орден Молота сохранит высшую власть над миром.

traits.locale_text: The powerful, influential cult of Saint Drusus is willing to take the young abode of faith under its wing. However, the Order of the Hammer accepts these gifts with caution, wary of the figure of Drusus eclipsing their own patron saint, Cognatius, in the hearts of their flock.

The powerful, influential cult of Saint Drusus is willing to take the young abode of faith under its wing. However, the Order of the Hammer accepts these gifts with caution, wary of the figure of Drusus eclipsing their own patron saint, Cognatius, in the hearts of their flock.
The privilege of becoming Foulstone's patron is a tempting prospect for many. However, with the Rogue Trader's assistance, the Order of the Hammer will retain ultimate authority over the world.

The powerful, influential cult of Saint Drusus is willing to take the young abode of faith under its wing. However, the Order of the Hammer accepts these gifts with caution, wary of the figure of Drusus eclipsing their own patron saint, Cognatius, in the hearts of their flock.
The privilege of becoming Foulstone's patron is a tempting prospect for many. However, with the Rogue Trader's assistance, the Order of the Hammer will retain ultimate authority over the world.
The privilege of becoming Foulstone's patron is a tempting prospect for many. However, with the Rogue Trader's assistance, the Order of the Hammer will retain ultimate authority over the world.

languages.text: El privilegio de ser patrón de Rocainmunda es una propuesta tentadora para muchos. Sin embargo, gracias a la ayuda de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, la Orden del Martillo conservará la autoridad suprema sobre el planeta.
languages.original_text: The privilege of becoming Foulstone's patron is a tempting prospect for many. However, with the Rogue Trader's assistance, the Order of the Hammer will retain ultimate authority over the world.

traits.locale_text: El privilegio de ser patrón de Rocainmunda es una propuesta tentadora para muchos. Sin embargo, gracias a la ayuda de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, la Orden del Martillo conservará la autoridad suprema sobre el planeta.

languages.text: Beaucoup seraient tentés de devenir le protecteur ou la protectrice de Rochepeste. Cependant, et avec le soutien {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, l'Ordre du Marteau conservera l'autorité ultime sur ce monde.
languages.original_text: The privilege of becoming Foulstone's patron is a tempting prospect for many. However, with the Rogue Trader's assistance, the Order of the Hammer will retain ultimate authority over the world.

traits.locale_text: Beaucoup seraient tentés de devenir le protecteur ou la protectrice de Rochepeste. Cependant, et avec le soutien {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, l'Ordre du Marteau conservera l'autorité ultime sur ce monde.

languages.text: 对许多人来说，能成为荒寂岩地的统治者都是相当诱人的前景。不过，在行商浪人的协助之下，重锤修会将会成为这个世界的最终主宰。
languages.original_text: The privilege of becoming Foulstone's patron is a tempting prospect for many. However, with the Rogue Trader's assistance, the Order of the Hammer will retain ultimate authority over the world.

traits.locale_text: 对许多人来说，能成为荒寂岩地的统治者都是相当诱人的前景。不过，在行商浪人的协助之下，重锤修会将会成为这个世界的最终主宰。

languages.text: ファウルストーンの後援者になる特権は、多くの者にとって魅力的なものだ。しかし、ローグトレーダーの助けがあれば、鉄槌の修道会は世界の絶対的な権力となる。
languages.original_text: The privilege of becoming Foulstone's patron is a tempting prospect for many. However, with the Rogue Trader's assistance, the Order of the Hammer will retain ultimate authority over the world.

traits.locale_text: ファウルストーンの後援者になる特権は、多くの者にとって魅力的なものだ。しかし、ローグトレーダーの助けがあれば、鉄槌の修道会は世界の絶対的な権力となる。

languages.text: Das Privileg, zum Patron von Foulstone zu werden, ist für viele eine verlockende Vorstellung. Doch mit der Unterstützung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wird der Orden des Hammers die ultimative Macht über die Welt beibehalten.
languages.original_text: The privilege of becoming Foulstone's patron is a tempting prospect for many. However, with the Rogue Trader's assistance, the Order of the Hammer will retain ultimate authority over the world.

traits.locale_text: Das Privileg, zum Patron von Foulstone zu werden, ist für viele eine verlockende Vorstellung. Doch mit der Unterstützung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wird der Orden des Hammers die ultimative Macht über die Welt beibehalten.

languages.text: Menfurtaş'ın hamisi olma ayrıcalığı, çok kişinin arzuladığı bir şeydir. Lakin dünyada nihai hükmün sahibi, Hür Tacir'in de yardımıyla Çekiç Tarikatı olacaktır.
languages.original_text: The privilege of becoming Foulstone's patron is a tempting prospect for many. However, with the Rogue Trader's assistance, the Order of the Hammer will retain ultimate authority over the world.
